Absorb.description: It damages an enemy. It also restores your HP. The greater the damage it causes, the more HP it restores.
Absorb.name: Absorb

AncientPower.description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Travel Speed. The stats return to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.
AncientPower.name: Ancient Power

Bite.description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.
Bite.name: Bite

BoneClub.description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch.
BoneClub.name: Bone Club

BrickBreak.description: It damages an enemy. It also shatters the enemy's Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil conditions.
BrickBreak.name: Brick Break

BrutalSwing.name: Brutal Swing
BrutalSwing.range: Nearby Pokemon (2 tiles away in all directions)

BulletPunch.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.
BulletPunch.name: Bullet Punch

ChargeBeam.description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Sp. Atk. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile
ChargeBeam.name: Charge Beam

Confusion.description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Confused.
Confusion.name: Confusion

DoubleKick.description: It damages an enemy 2 times in a row.
DoubleKick.name: Double Kick

DragonBreath.description: It damages a Pokemon, even one far away. It could also cause Paralysis.
DragonBreath.name: Dragon Breath

DragonRage.description: It inflicts a set amount of damage on an enemy. The greater your level, the further this move can reach.
DragonRage.name: Dragon Rage

EchoedVoice.description: It damages enemies. It causes more damage if it's used repeatedly. The power also goes up when you use it after a teammate uses it.
EchoedVoice.name: Echoed Voice
EchoedVoice.range: Nearby Pokemon (One tile in all directions)

ElectroBall.description: It damages an enemy. The higher your Speed compared to that of the enemy, the greater the damage caused.
ElectroBall.name: Electro Ball

Ember.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away. It could also leave the enemy with a Burn
Ember.name: Ember

Facade.description: It damages an enemy. The damage it causes goes up if you have a bad status. It also prevents your Attack from being lowered when you use this move while you have a Burn.
Facade.name: Facade

FakeOut.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away. It could also make the enemy Flinch.
FakeOut.name: Fake Out

FlameBurst.description: It even damages a faraway Pokemon. It also damages Pokemon around the target.
FlameBurst.name: Flame Burst

FoulPlay.description: It damages an enemy. But the damage is determined by the target's Attack stat instead of the user's Attack stat.
FoulPlay.name: Foul Play

GrassKnot.description: It damages an enemy. The heavier the enemy, the greater the damage caused by the move.
GrassKnot.name: Grass Knot

Headbutt.description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Flinch
Headbutt.name: Headbutt

IceFang.description: It damages an enemy. It could make the enemy Frozen or cause it to Flinch.
IceFang.name: Ice Fang

IronTail.description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's Defense.
IronTail.name: Iron Tail

KarateChop.description: It damages an enemy. It has a high critical-hit rate.
KarateChop.name: Karate Chop

LowKick.description: It damages an enemy. The heavier the enemy, the greater the damage.
LowKick.name: Low Kick

MetalClaw.description: It damages an enemy. It could also boost your Attack. The stat returns to normal when you go to the next floor or step on a Wonder Tile.
MetalClaw.name: Metal Claw

MudBomb.description: It damages an enemy. It could also lower the enemy's accuracy.
MudBomb.name: Mud Bomb

MudSlap.description: It damages an enemy. It also lowers the enemy's accuracy.
MudSlap.name: Mud Slap

RazorLeaf.description: It damages a pokemon, even one far away. It has a high critical-hit rate.
RazorLeaf.name: Razor Leaf

QuickAttack.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.
QuickAttack.name: Quick Attack

Sludge.description: It damages an enemy. It could also make the enemy Poisoned.
Sludge.name: Sludge

Swift.description: It damages an enemy. It never misses.
Swift.name: Swift

VineWhip.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.
VineWhip.name: Vine Whip

WaterGun.description: It damages an enemy. It reaches up to 2 tiles away.
WaterGun.name: Water Gun

ZenHeadbutt.description: It damages an enemy. It could also cause the enemy to Flinch.
ZenHeadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
